price: 49. (Waxaa lagu dhihi): Dhadhami (Cadaabka), Waxaad (iska yeeleysay) inaad tahay adkaadaha, sharafta leh11.
footnotes: 11. Waa sida uu sheeganayey intii uu joogay arlada. Waxaa lagu odhanayaa ereyadan digasho ahaan si loo xusuusiyo oo loo liido iyo cadaab dheeri ah ahaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
